name: attacks
description: Attack data from SLP replay files - individual moves that connected

columns.name: attack_id
columns.comment: Sequential attack identifier for this player

columns.name: move_id
columns.comment: ID of the move that hit

columns.name: move_name
columns.comment: Short name of the move that hit

columns.name: frame
columns.comment: Frame the move connected (0 == internal frame -123)

columns.name: punish_id
columns.comment: Index of the punish this move is a part of (one punish per opening)

columns.name: cancel_type
columns.comment: How the move was canceled (as applicable)

columns.name: cancel_name
columns.comment: Short name of the cancel type

columns.name: hit_id
columns.comment: Index of the hit number for the current move (applies only to multihits)

columns.name: anim_frame
columns.comment: Animation frame when the move hit

columns.name: opening
columns.comment: Opening type for first hit of punish

columns.name: kill_dir
columns.comment: Direction of kill, as specified in Dir enum (-1 = didn't kill)
